# Description of Plot Type
- [ ] Describe the type of plot.
- [ ] What does it look like?
- [ ] What will it be used for?
- [ ] Link an image or sketch of an example of this plot type.

# Discussion
- [ ] Explain the plot's use in a scientific context. Describe any known previous implementations. Provide an idea of how it could be implemented.
